Hi,

In Prism the Stock Trader Reference Implementation Application provides you an example about how to display a ChildWindow. It uses Navigation for displaying a dialog in a region, and there is no limitation for achieving this from a ViewModel.

If you need to close a dialog, you could use Commands and from your view model get the view and remove it from the region.

I think that you can find the following forum threads interesting:

  • Close dialog window design suggestions
  • ChildWindow closed command

Hope this helps.
